description: Structured information about a mixture of chemical substances.
label: Chemical mixture
name: ChemicalMixture

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/additio._instruction: Enter any additional remarks concerning this chemical mixture.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/additio.description: Mention of what deserves additional attention or notice.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/additio.label: Additional remarks
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/additio.name: additionalRemarks

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/hasPart._instruction: Enter all components, including other mixtures, that are part of this chemical mixture.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/hasPart.label: Has part
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/hasPart.name: hasPart

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/name._instruction: Enter the name of this chemical mixture.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/name.description: Word or phrase that constitutes the distinctive designation of a being or thing.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/name.label: Name
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/name.name: name

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/product._instruction: Add the source of this chemical mixture.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/product.label: Product source
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/product.name: productSource

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/type._instruction: Add the type of this mixture.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/type.description: Distinct class to which a group of entities or concepts with similar characteristics or attributes belong to.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/type.label: Type
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/type.name: type
